018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021
022import java.util.Optional;
023
024import org.apiguardian.api.API;
025import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.INIFile;
027
028/**
029 *  <p>{@summary When a configuration bean should be connected with an
030 *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.INIFile INI}
031 *  file (a Windows style configuration file), the respective configuration
032 *  bean specification interface needs to extend this interface.}</p>
033 *  <p>A configuration bean can be connected to only one {@code INI} file, and
034 *  properties that are kept in
035 *  {@link java.util.prefs.Preferences Preferences}
036 *  cannot be held in the {@code INI}, too, and vice versa.</p>
037 *  <p>The configuration bean specification must use the annotation
038 *  {@link INIFileConfig &#64;INIFileConfig}
039 *  to specify the path to the configuration file. In addition, each getter has
040 *  to be annotated with
041 *  {@link INIValue &#64;INIValue}
042 *  to define its coordinates in the configuration.</p>
043 *  <p>When the file is created by the program itself, the respective
044 *  comments from the annotations will be added to the new file; for the
045 *  groups, these can be provided through the
046 *  {@link INIGroup &#64;INIGroup}
047 *  and
048 *  {@link INIGroups &#64;INIGroups}
049 *  annotations</p>
050 *  <p>The configuration values will <i>not</i> be loaded automatically from
051 *  the {@code INI} file. A call to
052 *  {@link #loadINIFile()}
053 *  is required.</p>
054 *  <p>A call to
055 *  {@link #updateINIFile()}
056 *  persists the respective value.</p>
057 *
058 *  @version $Id: INIBeanSpec.java 946 2021-12-23 14:48:19Z tquadrat $
059 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
060 *  @UMLGraph.link
061 *  @since 0.1.0
062 */
063@SuppressWarnings( "InterfaceNeverImplemented" )
064@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: INIBeanSpec.java 946 2021-12-23 14:48:19Z tquadrat $" )
065@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
066public interface INIBeanSpec extends ConfigBeanSpec
067{
068        /*---------*\
069    ====** Methods **==========================================================
070        \*---------*/
071    /**
072     *  Loads the configuration values from the
073     *  {@link INIFile}
074     *  that is connected to this configuration bean.
075     */
076    public void loadINIFile();
077
078    /**
079     *  Returns a reference to the
080     *  {@link INIFile}
081     *  instance that backs up this configuration bean.
082     *
083     *  @return An instance of
084     *      {@link Optional}
085     *      that holds the {@code INIFile} instance.
086     */
087    public Optional<INIFile> obtainINIFile();
088
089    /**
090     *  Persists the configuration values to the
091     *  {@link INIFile}
092     *  that is connected to this configuration bean.
093     */
094    public void updateINIFile();
095}
096//  interface INIBeanSpec
097
098/*
099 *  End of File
100 */
